content.html: The Rules of the Standards club: 1. Check if you actually need to create one 2. Check you can't use an existing one 3. Take advantage of other standards and practices 4. Put a version number inside documents 5. Provide tools from the start 6. Think extensibility What else?
content.value:
The Rules of the Standards club:
1. Check if you actually need to create one
2. Check you can't use an existing one
3. Take advantage of other standards and practices
4. Put a version number inside documents
5. Provide tools from the start
6. Think extensibility
What else?
